title: SimVibe 4
description: A motion simulation software engine is the heart of any motion simulator. It creates the simulators movement instructions and is therfore one of the most critical pieces of the performance puzzle. SimXperience's own Sim Commander 4 motion engine leads the way in ease of use, performance and tunability. Home users can easily get started by double clicking a ready made 'Sim Setup' icon from the Sim Commander's main menu. Advanced users and engineers can drill down in realtime to create a fully customized simulation experience. Every aspect of the motion simulator is fully customizable such as acceleration, braking, lateral G forces, yaw, pitch, roll, rear traction loss, etc.. Simply put, the Sim Commander 4 is the most advanced and versatile motion simulation engine available yet it's simple to use
